summary: In Victorian England, Sue, a young thief, participates in a scam to defraud a rich heiress by becoming her maid. Things take an unexpected turn and Sue's plan goes horribly wrong.
cast: Elaine Cassidy|Sally Hawkins|Imelda Staunton|Rupert Evans|Polly Hemingway|Sarah Badel|Charles Dance|David Troughton|Bronson Webb|Demelza Randall|Stephen Wight|Stephanie Middleton|Tallulah Pitt-Brown|Richard Durden|Sam Graham|William Oliver|Laura Dos Santos|Nick Lucas|Wendy Morgan|Tim Preece|Anna Mottram|Anna Jordan|Tina Malone|Sophie Stanton|Michelle Dockery|Eileen Page|Sylvester Morand|David Keyes|Leighton Pugh|Ian Midlane|Henry Andrew Winkler|Karen Seacombe

title: Fingersmith
